entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Morrisburg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
